title: Cherry 🍒 Jam | Only 3 Ingredients | Homemade
content:
Jam Recipe: Cherry Jam  Yields : 500 gms  Duration : 30 minutes  When cherries 🍒, berries and any other fruits, those are abundantly available in summer season! so, go grab a pack of fruits and turn them into jam. It’s such a great idea making jam at home 🏡 by using only three basic ingredients those are frequently available at kitchen. The only step I spent few minutes before the process is to deseed the cherries 🍒 I chopped cherries and removed seeds, it takes around 10-15 minutes of time or you can use pit remover machine The preparation of jam isn’t complicated it’s super simple and worth making homemade jam, in store bought jam they use pectin for persevering but here I haven’t used it and also you can store them nicely because I added lemon juice. It helps for safe canning and prevents growth of bacteria, I hope you all love this simple homemade jam recipe 😊 Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Cherries - fresh - 1 kg - Chop and remove seeds
  • Granulated sugar - 350 grams
  • Lemon juice - freshly squeezed - 1/2 tb sp
Procedure:
  • Add in Chopped cherries 🍒 on a medium heated  sauce pan or deep frying pan
  • Sauté 2 minutes and then add sugar
  • Combine well and let it come to a boil
  • Keep stirring, the sugar syrup slowly starts thickening at this time add lemon juice
  • Mix well and the whole process takes around 20-30 minutes and you can turn off heat when the consistency reduces double in quantity and the texture looks creamy and glossy as Jam
  • Keep the pan on kitchen towel and let it completely cool down and then pour in airtight container or sterilized jars
  • It can be preserved upto 5 months - If refrigerated
  • Happy cooking and Have a blissful day 🍨
